definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
special appointment/special correspondent/task force/sb dispatched on a mission
to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to select/to detail/to set apart/to appoint

sentences.english: I have an inspector and two officers waiting at the front door .
sentences.chinese: 我已派了一个巡官和两个警官守候在前门那里。

sentences.english: Should we dispatch cadres to help exercise regional national autonomy?
sentences.chinese: 又比如实行民族区域自治，我们派不派干部？

sentences.english: Should we dispatch cadres to help exercise regional national autonomy?
sentences.chinese: 又比如实行民族区域自治，我们派不派干部？

sentences.english: Q. How many fundamentalists does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 把一个灯泡转进灯座，需要多少位基要派呢？

sentences.english: But the Separatists discovered that the Speedwell leaked and therefore could not make the journey.
sentences.chinese: 可是分离派发现斯碧薇尔号漏水了，所以无法航行。

sentences.english: Whom will Xerxes dare to send next?
My mother is one of the Methodists.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲是卫理公会派教徒之一。

sentences.english: Pies and tarts often contain berries as do many other pastries.
sentences.chinese: 派和馅饼常以浆果为陷，而许多糕饼类亦然。

sentences.english: That summer, I could see why the Czar sent his men to give her a prize.
sentences.chinese: 在那个夏天，我明白沙皇为什么要派人来给她颁奖了。

sentences.english: I'm checking out now. Will you send someone for my baggage, please?
sentences.chinese: 我现在要退房，请派个人来拿我的行李好吗？

sentences.english: A listing of all the museums and institutions represented on the HAR web site.
sentences.chinese: 列出所有的博物馆和机构派代表参加的Har网站。

sentences.english: Wang Bingnan was sent to take part in several meetings held by Gung Ho in its initial period.
sentences.chinese: 王炳南被派去参加了工合早期的多次会议。

sentences.english: It must have been a work of vast ability in the somniferous school of literature.
sentences.chinese: 那准是一部催眠派文献中卓有功效的作品。

sentences.english: The Chinese Embassy has already sent a working group to visit them.
sentences.chinese: 中国驻日使领馆已经派工作组探望了有关渔民。

sentences.english: Even if cattle, horsed were sent from hell.
sentences.chinese: 阴间即使派来牛头马面。

sentences.english: Place the pie on a wire rack and cool to room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 烤好之后将派放在铁架上冷却至室温。

definition: to receive orders/to follow orders/to act under orders
to stay behind to take care of things
(of troops stationed in a strategic area) to defend/(fig.) to stand guard/to protect
under one's control or administration/subordinates/(money etc) on hand/sb's financial means/to take action
